alert.note: Alert for Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 03 at 7:37PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Box Elder and northwestern Tooele Counties through 815 PM MDT... At 736 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles northeast of Montello to 12 miles north of Utah Test and Training Range South. Movement was northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Wendover, Utah Test and Training Range North, Lucin and Bonneville Salt Flats. This includes the following highways... Interstate 80 in Utah between mile markers 0 and 37. Utah Route 30 between mile markers 1 and 29. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A severe thunderstorm watch remains in effect until 900 PM MDT for northern Utah.

area.areaDesc: Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains
